Query.SqlString: SELECT Top 32767 ID,Literature FROM Literature WHERE (Literature ='HYL81')

BibliographicData.Title: Widespread Corticostriate projections From Temporal Cortex of the Rhesus Monkey

Reference.Quotation: "Cases 1 and 2 have injections in the dorsomedial temporal pole, area TG of Bonin and Bailey."

"Five injections were made in the entorrhinal and parahipocampal areas. Two are in the posterior part of the entorhinal cortex (area 28M) and the other three in Bonin and Bailey's area TF. ...However cases 10-12 with injections in the lareral part of the parahippocampal area TF."

"Cases 1 and 2 have injections in the dorsomedial temporal pole, area TG of Bonin and Bailey."
"Cases 3 and 4 have injections in the rostral superior temporal gyrus in Bonin and Bailey area TA or Brodmanns area 22."
